original_title: Claude Miller, cinéaste de l'intime, ou Claude M le cinéma
overview: Since childhood, Claude Miller was mad about movies. From a cinephile he became a filmmaker, a craftsman of "mainstream auteur cinema " believing in the sensitivity and imagination of the viewer. Suggesting the most, while showing the least possible, his work is of an elegant modesty.
title: Claude Miller, cinéaste de l'intime, ou Claude M le cinéma
